Actions.Name: Flesh warp
Actions.Description: The [name] rips itself apart, then reassembles. It teleports 2, then teleports 2. It can split up these teleports with another action.

Actions.Name: Chaos Beam
Actions.Effects: Roll 1d6 and apply the following effects to all characters within. Effects, except vigor and statuses, last until the end of the round.

Rolls.Description: Characters may teleport when they move.
Characters that end their turn adjacent to at least one other character take 5 damage per adjacent character, then grant 5 vigor to each adjacent character.
Characters are removed from the battlefield, then returned to play at the start of their next turn anywhere within range 2 of their original space.
Characters are reduced to 50% max hp if above 50% max hp. Bloodied characters gain a vigor surge.

Actions.Name: Warping Blast
Actions.Description: Remove all characters in the area from the battlefield, then place them in any space within range 3 of their original location.
